description: Gets recommendations about architecture designs for improving resiliency for an application, based on a recovery group.

parameters.name: RecoveryGroupName
parameters.description: The name of a recovery group.

nested_items.name: LastAuditTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time that a recovery group was last assessed for recommendations, in UTC ISO-8601 format.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token that identifies which batch of results you want to see.

nested_items.name: Recommendations
nested_items.description: A list of the recommendations for the customer's application.

nested_items.name: RecommendationText
nested_items.description: Text of the recommendations that are provided to make an application more recovery resilient.
